item.title: Convert all JPG images to webP
item.description: It loops through all the jpg images in the folder and converts them to webP with the given configuration of quality and size for file in *.jpg; do cwebp -q 85 -m 6 -resize 1800 0 -metadata none "$file" -o "${file%.*}.webp"; done
